articles.author: Nellie Peyton, Bhargav Acharya
articles.title: South Africa accused of 'horrific' crackdown as 78 corpses pulled from besieged mine - Reuters
articles.description: A total of 78 bodies and 166 survivors - some of them emaciated and disorientated - have been hauled out so far in a court-ordered rescue operation, with hundreds more men still stuck 2 km (1.5 miles) below the surface in a gold mine at Stilfontein, southwest…
